blocks.name: df-xrn
blocks.content: Define the range Cartesian product of two classes. Definition from [Holmes] p. 40. Membership in this class is characterized by ~ xrnss3v and ~ brxrn . This is Scott Fenton's ~ df-txp with a different symbol, see ~ https://github.com/metamath/set.mm/issues/2469 . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 31-Mar-2012.)

blocks.name: xrnss3v
blocks.content: A range Cartesian product is a subset of the class of ordered triples. This is Scott Fenton's ~ txpss3v with a different symbol, see ~ https://github.com/metamath/set.mm/issues/2469 . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 31-Mar-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrnss3v(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wss(cxrn(c0, c1), cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe)))
} = {
  eqsstri(cxrn(c0, c1), cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe)), cin(ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c0), ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c1)))
  df-xrn(c0, c1)
  sstri(cin(ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c0), ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c1)), cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe)), ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c0))
  inss1(ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c0), ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c1))
  relssi(hs0, hs1, ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c0), cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe)))
  relco(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c0)
  3imtr4i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(universe, universe)))
  exlimiv(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(universe, universe)))
  adantl(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(universe, universe)))
  sylbi(wbr(cv(hs2), ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(universe, universe)), wbr(cv(hs1), cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe)), cv(hs2)))
  brcnv(cv(hs2), cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe)), cv(hs1))
  simplbi(wbr(cv(hs1), cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe)), cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(universe, universe)), wbr(cv(hs1), c1st, cv(hs2)))
  brresi(cv(hs1), c1st, cxp(universe, universe), cv(hs2))
  vex(hs2)
  opelco(hs2, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c0)
  vex(hs1)
  mpbiran(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe))), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  opelxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), universe, cxp(universe, universe))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe)))
  diff.hs1.c(ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cxp(universe, cxp(universe, universe)))
  diff.hs2.w(wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(universe, universe)))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.c(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xrnss3v(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 |X. c1)⊆(𝕌 ×(𝕌 × 𝕌))
} = {
  eqsstri((c0 |X. c1), (𝕌 ×(𝕌 × 𝕌)), ((`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c0)⋂(`'(2nd |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c1)))
  df-xrn(c0, c1)
  sstri(((`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c0)⋂(`'(2nd |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c1)), (𝕌 ×(𝕌 × 𝕌)), (`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c0))
  inss1((`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c0), (`'(2nd |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c1))
  relssi(hs0, hs1, (`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c0), (𝕌 ×(𝕌 × 𝕌)))
  relco(`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌)), c0)
  3imtr4i(< hs0, hs1 > ∈(`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c0), < hs0, hs1 > ∈(𝕌 ×(𝕌 × 𝕌)), ∃(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ∧ hs2[`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))]hs1)), hs1 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  exlimiv(hs2, (hs0[c0]hs2 ∧ hs2[`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))]hs1), hs1 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  adantl(hs0[c0]hs2, hs2[`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))]hs1, hs1 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  sylbi(hs2[`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))]hs1, hs1 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), hs1[(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))]hs2)
  brcnv(hs2, (1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌)), hs1)
  simplbi(hs1[(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))]hs2, hs1 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), hs1[1st]hs2)
  brresi(hs1, c1st, (𝕌 × 𝕌), hs2)
  vex(hs2)
  opelco(hs2, hs0, hs1, `'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌)), c0)
  vex(hs1)
  mpbiran(< hs0, hs1 > ∈(𝕌 ×(𝕌 × 𝕌)), hs1 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(hs0)
  opelxp(hs0, hs1, universe, (𝕌 × 𝕌))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c((`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c0))
  diff.hs0.c((𝕌 ×(𝕌 × 𝕌)))
  diff.hs1.c((`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))∘ c0))
  diff.hs1.c((𝕌 ×(𝕌 × 𝕌)))
  diff.hs2.w(hs1 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(`'(1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌)))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: xrnrel
blocks.content: A range Cartesian product is a relation. This is Scott Fenton's ~ txprel with a different symbol, see ~ https://github.com/metamath/set.mm/issues/2469 . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 31-Mar-2012.)

blocks.name: brxrn
blocks.content: Characterize a ternary relation over a range Cartesian product. Together with ~ xrnss3v , this characterizes elementhood in a range cross. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 27-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm brxrn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wb(wbr(c0, cxrn(c6, c7), cop(c2, c4)), wa(wbr(c0, c6, c2), wbr(c0, c7, c4))))
} = {
  3bitrd(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wbr(c0, cxrn(c6, c7), cop(c2, c4)), wa(wbr(c0, c6, c2), wbr(c0, c7, c4)), wbr(c0, cin(ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c6), ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c7)), cop(c2, c4)), wa(wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c6), cop(c2, c4)), wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c7), cop(c2, c4))))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wb(wbr(c0, cxrn(c6, c7), cop(c2, c4)), wbr(c0, cin(ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c6), ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c7)), cop(c2, c4))))
  breqi(c0, cxrn(c6, c7), cop(c2, c4), cin(ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c6), ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c7)))
  df-xrn(c6, c7)
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wb(wbr(c0, cin(ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c6), ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c7)), cop(c2, c4)), wa(wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c6), cop(c2, c4)), wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c7), cop(c2, c4)))))
  brin(c0, ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c6), ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c7), cop(c2, c4))
  anbi12d(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c6), cop(c2, c4)), wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c7), cop(c2, c4)), wbr(c0, c6, c2), wbr(c0, c7, c4))
  3bitrd(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c6), cop(c2, c4)), wbr(c0, c6, c2), wex(hs0, wa(wbr(c0, c6, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), cop(c2, c4)))), wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(c0, c6, cv(hs0)))))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wb(wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c6), cop(c2, c4)), wex(hs0, wa(wbr(c0, c6, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), cop(c2, c4))))))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c6), cop(c2, c4)), wex(hs0, wa(wbr(c0, c6, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), cop(c2, c4))))), wcel(cop(c2, c4), universe))
  brcog(hs0, c0, c1, cop(c2, c4), universe, ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), c6)
  exbidv(hs0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wa(wbr(c0, c6, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), cop(c2, c4))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(c0, c6, cv(hs0))))
  anbi1cd(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wbr(c0, c6, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), cop(c2, c4)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  syl5bb(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), cop(c2, c4)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cop(c2, c4), cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe)), cv(hs0)))
  elv(hs0, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe))), cop(c2, c4)), wbr(cop(c2, c4), cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe)), cv(hs0))))

  brcnvg(cv(hs0), universe, cop(c2, c4), universe, cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wb(wbr(cop(c2, c4), cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wbr(cop(c2, c4), cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cop(c2, c4), c1st, cv(hs0)))
  syl6rbbr(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wbr(cop(c2, c4), cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe)), cv(hs0)), wbr(cop(c2, c4), c1st, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cop(c2, c4), cxp(universe, universe)), wbr(cop(c2, c4), c1st, cv(hs0))))
  biantrurd(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wbr(cop(c2, c4), c1st, cv(hs0)), wcel(cop(c2, c4), cxp(universe, universe)))
  elv(hs0, wb(wbr(cop(c2, c4), cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe)), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cop(c2, c4), cxp(universe, universe)), wbr(cop(c2, c4), c1st, cv(hs0)))))
  brres(cv(hs0), universe, cop(c2, c4), c1st, cxp(universe, universe))
  br1steqg(c2, c3, c4, c5, cv(hs0))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wb(wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(c0, c6, cv(hs0)))), wbr(c0, c6, c2)))
  ceqsexgv(hs0, c2, c3, wbr(c0, c6, cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, c6, c2))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c2, c0, c6)
  3bitrd(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c7), cop(c2, c4)), wbr(c0, c7, c4), wex(hs1, wa(wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), cop(c2, c4)))), wex(hs1, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c4), wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs1)))))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wb(wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c7), cop(c2, c4)), wex(hs1, wa(wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), cop(c2, c4))))))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), c7), cop(c2, c4)), wex(hs1, wa(wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe))), cop(c2, c4))))), wcel(cop(c2, c4), universe))

  opelvvg(c2, c3, c4, c5)

  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wb(wex(hs1, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c4), wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs1)))), wbr(c0, c7, c4)))
  ceqsexgv(hs1, c4, c5, wbr(c0, c7, cv(hs1)), wbr(c0, c7, c4))

blocks.name: brxrn2
blocks.content: A characterization of the range Cartesian product. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 14-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm brxrn2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c0, cxrn(c2, c3), c4), wex(s0, wex(s1, w3a(wceq(c4, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, c3, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cxrn(c2, c3), c4), wex(s0, wex(s1, w3a(wceq(c4, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, c3, cv(s1))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c4, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(c0, cxrn(c2, c3), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))

thm dfxrn2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)

} = {
  3eqtr2i(cxrn(c0, c1), ccnv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c1, cv(s1))))), copab(s2, hs0, wbr(cv(s2), cxrn(c0, c1), cv(hs0))), ccnv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cv(s2), cxrn(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  mpbi(wceq(cxrn(c0, c1), copab(s2, hs0, wbr(cv(s2), cxrn(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))), wrel(cxrn(c0, c1)))
  xrnrel(c0, c1)
  dfrel4v(s2, hs0, cxrn(c0, c1))
  cnvoprab(s0, s1, s2, hs0, wbr(cv(s2), cxrn(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s2), cxrn(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))
  simplbi(wbr(cv(s2), cxrn(c0, c1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wbr(cv(s2), cxrn(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))
  3bitr2i(wbr(cv(s2), cxrn(c0, c1), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wbr(cv(s2), cxrn(c0, c1), cv(hs0))), wex(s0, wex(s1, w3a(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c1, cv(s1))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s2), cxrn(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  elv(s2, wb(wbr(cv(s2), cxrn(c0, c1), cv(hs0)), wex(s0, wex(s1, w3a(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c1, cv(s1)))))))
  brxrn2(s0, s1, cv(s2), universe, c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  2exbii(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s2), cxrn(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), w3a(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c1, cv(s1))))
  bitr4i(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s2), cxrn(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), w3a(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c1, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c1, cv(s1)))))
  anbi2i(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s2), cxrn(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c1, cv(s1))))
  3anass(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c1, cv(s1)))
  copsex2gb(s0, s1, cv(hs0), wbr(cv(s2), cxrn(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s2), cxrn(c0, c1), cv(hs0)))

thm dfxrn2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 |X. c1)= `' { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |(s2[c0]s0 ∧ s2[c1]s1)}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  3eqtr2i((c0 |X. c1), `' { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |(s2[c0]s0 ∧ s2[c1]s1)}, { < s2, hs0 > | s2[(c0 |X. c1)]hs0 }, `' { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2[(c0 |X. c1)]< s0, s1 > })
  mpbi((c0 |X. c1)= { < s2, hs0 > | s2[(c0 |X. c1)]hs0 }, Rel((c0 |X. c1)))
  xrnrel(c0, c1)
  dfrel4v(s2, hs0, (c0 |X. c1))
  cnvoprab(s0, s1, s2, hs0, s2[(c0 |X. c1)]< s0, s1 >, s2[(c0 |X. c1)]hs0)
  simplbi(s2[(c0 |X. c1)]hs0, hs0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), s2[(c0 |X. c1)]hs0)
  3bitr2i(s2[(c0 |X. c1)]hs0, (hs0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌)∧ s2[(c0 |X. c1)]hs0), ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ s2[c0]s0 ∧ s2[c1]s1))), ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ s2[(c0 |X. c1)]< s0, s1 >))))
  elv(s2, (s2[(c0 |X. c1)]hs0 ↔ ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ s2[c0]s0 ∧ s2[c1]s1)))))
  brxrn2(s0, s1, s2, universe, c0, c1, hs0)
  2exbii(s0, s1, (hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ s2[(c0 |X. c1)]< s0, s1 >), (hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ s2[c0]s0 ∧ s2[c1]s1))
  bitr4i((hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ s2[(c0 |X. c1)]< s0, s1 >), (hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ s2[c0]s0 ∧ s2[c1]s1), (hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧(s2[c0]s0 ∧ s2[c1]s1)))
  anbi2i(hs0 = < s0, s1 >, s2[(c0 |X. c1)]< s0, s1 >, (s2[c0]s0 ∧ s2[c1]s1))
  3anass(hs0 = < s0, s1 >, s2[c0]s0, s2[c1]s1)
  copsex2gb(s0, s1, hs0, s2[(c0 |X. c1)]< s0, s1 >, s2[(c0 |X. c1)]hs0)
  breq2(hs0, < s0, s1 >, s2, (c0 |X. c1))
  cnveqi({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2[(c0 |X. c1)]< s0, s1 > }, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |(s2[c0]s0 ∧ s2[c1]s1)})
  oprabbii(s0, s1, s2, s2[(c0 |X. c1)]< s0, s1 >, (s2[c0]s0 ∧ s2[c1]s1))
  el3v(s2, s0, s1, (s2[(c0 |X. c1)]< s0, s1 > ↔(s2[c0]s0 ∧ s2[c1]s1)))
  brxrn(s2, universe, s0, universe, s1, universe, c0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)

  diff.cxrn.s(s2, c0, c1)

thm elecxrn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cec(c0, cxrn(c3, c4))), wex(s0, wex(s1, w3a(wceq(c2, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, c4, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cec(c0, cxrn(c3, c4))), wex(s0, wex(s1, w3a(wceq(c2, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, c4, cv(s1))))), wbr(c0, cxrn(c3, c4), c2))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(c2, cec(c0, cxrn(c3, c4))), wbr(c0, cxrn(c3, c4), c2)), wrel(cxrn(c3, c4)))
  xrnrel(c3, c4)
  relelec(cxrn(c3, c4), c2, c0)
  brxrn2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c3, c4, c2)
}

  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c2 ∈[c0](c3 |X. c4)↔ ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(c2 = < s0, s1 > ∧ c0[c3]s0 ∧ c0[c4]s1)))))
